detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ShareholderVomer.fallback() (ShareholderVomer.sol#645-690):
	External calls:
	- ERC20Token(paymentToken).universalTransfer(msg.sender,rewardInActiveToken) (ShareholderVomer.sol#686)
	External calls sending eth:
	- payableUser.transfer(reward) (ShareholderVomer.sol#677)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- data.lastDatetime = block.timestamp (ShareholderVomer.sol#689)
	- dataEx.totalProfit[paymentToken] += rewardInActiveToken (ShareholderVomer.sol#687)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [ShareholderVomer.fallback()](ShareholderVomer.sol#L645-L690):
	External calls:
	- [ERC20Token(paymentToken).universalTransfer(msg.sender,rewardInActiveToken)](ShareholderVomer.sol#L686)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [payableUser.transfer(reward)](ShareholderVomer.sol#L677)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [data.lastDatetime = block.timestamp](ShareholderVomer.sol#L689)
	- [dataEx.totalProfit[paymentToken] += rewardInActiveToken](ShareholderVomer.sol#L687)
